articles.author: Selena Kuznikov
articles.title: Spice Girls Reunite and Perform ‘Stop’ Dance at Victoria Beckham’s 50th Birthday Party - Variety
articles.description: The Spice Girls reunited at Victoria Beckham's 50th birthday party on April 20, where they danced to their hit song 'Stop.'
articles.content:
The Spice Girls reunited at Victoria Beckham’s 50th birthday party on Saturday, where they danced to their hit song “Stop” in a video posted by David Beckham on Instagram.

articles.title: Taylor Swift's new album sells 1.6mn copies in US in single day - Financial Times
articles.description: Large proportion of sales come from traditional vinyl and CD formats
